summary:
I feel energized when I help people. And even more so when I manage to accomplish more than what is expected of me. I'm dynamic and at the same time flexible, and for this reason I encountered my path on the Supply Chain environment.

My additional professional values are:

- In possession of 2 bachelor diplomas (Communications with Focus on Marketing and Business
Management).
- I speak 4 languages.
- Knowledge of Communications, which can be applied for several internal communication channels and
with the contact with stakeholders.
- An eye for detail and accurate results.
- More than 15 years experience working in international environments.
- Great ability to develop creative strategies to resolve issues and identify opportunities.
- Flexibility (I always worked in flexible environments, switching between different projects, departments
and tasks).
- I can take decisions independently.

- My skills in Purchase/Procurement
     . Handling purchase contracts and order and all general administration surround it. 
     . Generating new sources, negotiating prices and agreements;
     . Identifying purchase strategies;
   
- My skills in Sales
  . Account management (B2B channels) and stakeholders management.
  . Sales Administration
 . New leads generation

- My skills in financial administration:
     . 15 years work experience with financial documentation and handling transactions in a very accurate way.
     . Sales and purchase invoicing;
     . Accurate and on-time financial statements and business partner balances; 
     . Investigation and active approach to any Dutch governmental inquiries, 
     . Dispute management, debt management and financial sales reports.
     . VAT returns and appliances. 
     . Excellent results in Financial Management during my both bachelor degrees.

- My skills in Logistics:
     . Experience with issuing export documents, certificates of origins and dealing with official communications with customs and Chamber of Commerce;
     . Responsible for contracts with carriers and handling transport insurances;
     . Transport planning and stock control;
     . Transport Costs Administration.

- My abilities in Marketing
     . Advising and elaborating Marketing communication and design for events and for the website (and eShop)
     . Formulating and planning promotions for all seasons
     . Price Management for distributors, resellers and eShop.
     - eCommerce: managing  all online channels (Amazon, eBay, Bol, eShop).

- As a parttime freelance writer, I write books and also articles for websites during my free time.

profile_positions.description:
- Being proudly part of a very cooperative, nice and small team.
- Purchase/Procurement Responsibilities: Handling purchase contracts, orders and administration; generating new sources, negotiating prices and agreements; identifying purchase and pricing strategies; planning stock and delivery.
- Financial responsibilities: Sales and purchase invoicing, accurate and on-time financial statements, investigation and active approach to any Dutch governmental inquiries, Dispute Management, Debt Management, Accounts reconciliation and financial reports related to sales, purchase and costs.
- Responsible for logistics processes (export and assisting with import documents, inbound and outbound logistics coordination, logistic contracts, strategic logistics solutions, costs analysis, stock management and transport planning);
- Sales: meetings with B2B clients, partners and suppliers; contracts elaboration, sales administration, leads for sales generation.
- Marketing Activities: mainly e-Commerce for the several online third party channels (Amazon, BOL, eBay and our own webshop), online content design, price management (both to B2B and B2C clients), Marketing Communication, leads generation and promotions elaboration.
- Stakeholders Management: managing contact and resolutions related to B2B clients, suppliers, transport companies, partners and governmental entities.
